pages.text: Add a grass overlay to a block by right-clicking it with a grass item. Currently, there are two grass overlay versions supported, a short and a long one, as shown in the image to the right. The grass $(o)will not be consumed$() in the process!

Add a snow overlay to a block by right-clicking it with a snowball item. Currently, there are two snow overlay versions supported, a long and a short one, as shown in the image to the right. The snowball $(o)will not be consumed$() in the process!

Add a vine overlay to a block by right-clicking it with a vine item. There is only one overlay version currently, which is shown in the image to the right. The vine $(o)will not be consumed$() in the process!
